channel.title: Latest Mozilla Add-on Releases
channel.description: RSS feed of the latest add-on updates from Mozilla Add-ons (AMO)

item.title: Rick & Morty Theme - By Mr.Bear v2.1
item.description:
Rick & Morty Theme - By Mr.Bear v2.1
A dark Firefox theme inspired by Rick and Morty, featuring a black toolbar, neon green accents, and a custom header image. Designed for good contrast and readability while matching the show’s sci-fi aesthetic.
Author: Mr.Bear • Categories: websites • Homepage: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/rick-morty-theme-by-mr-bear/ • Works with Firefox: 58.0 and later • ID: 2973381
item.author: Mr.Bear

item.title: Lego Theme - By Mr.Bear v1.0
item.description:
Lego Theme - By Mr.Bear v1.0
A custom Firefox theme inspired by LEGO-style visuals, featuring a transparent top bar with a bold blue background and yellow accent colors. The theme enhances the browser interface while allowing the background image to remain fully visible.
Author: Mr.Bear • Categories: film-and-tv • Homepage: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/lego-theme-by-mr-bear/ • Works with Firefox: 58.0 and later • ID: 2973674
